title: (x) Madison - Akzidenz-Grotesk Condensed {Mike Y}
content: Can someone please help me identify this font? Thanks as always... ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518051354im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/20437.jpg)
author: julia

comments.content: Looks more like Folio Bold Condensed, not sure from which foundy though... Elsner+Flake's version looks closest

I don't think it's either of those, and for my money, [Helvetica Bold Condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518051354/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/helvetica/condensed-bold/testdrive.html?s=Madison&p=72) is closer than either, though there are tiny but discernible differences.
I think we're looking at Berthold [Akzidenz-Grotesk Condensed Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518051354/http:/www.philsfonts.com/detail.html?sku=AB80270007P1).

I think Mike has it. Thats my opinion too.   
   
Hildebrant.
